misinformations.text: Vaccines cause autism.
COVID-19 was created as a bioweapon.
Drinking bleach can cure diseases.
Natural remedies are always safer and more effective than pharmaceuticals.
The flu shot gives you the flu.
Cancer has a cure that is being hidden by pharmaceutical companies.
You only use 10% of your brain.
Microwaving food makes it radioactive.
5G technology weakens the immune system.
You can "sweat out" toxins through saunas or exercise.
Face masks cause carbon dioxide poisoning.
Vaccines alter your DNA.
COVID-19 is no worse than the flu.
The pandemic was a hoax.
Bill Gates implanted microchips through vaccines.
Climate change is a hoax.
Genetically modified organisms (GMOs) are inherently dangerous.
Cell phones cause brain cancer.
Artificial Intelligence will soon become conscious and take over the world.
The Earth is flat.
Humans coexisted with dinosaurs.
Einstein failed math in school.
Vikings wore horned helmets.
Napoleon Bonaparte was extremely short.
Elections are routinely rigged in democratic countries.
Politicians are part of secret satanic cults (e.g., QAnon).
Foreign aid makes up most of the national budget.
The moon landing was faked.
9/11 was an inside job.
Mainstream media is entirely fake or state-controlled.
Photoshop and AI-generated images prove any conspiracy.
Fact-checkers are biased and part of a cover-up.
Everything on Wikipedia is inaccurate.
If it’s trending, it must be true.
Banks literally “print money” without backing.
Cryptocurrency guarantees wealth without risk.
You don’t need to pay taxes if you declare yourself a sovereign citizen.
Stock market investing is gambling.
The Federal Reserve is a private, profit-making company.
A full moon causes people to act irrationally.
Cracking your knuckles causes arthritis.
Detox diets cleanse your organs.
Eating fat makes you fat.
You must drink 8 glasses of water a day.
Organic food contains no pesticides.
Sugar causes hyperactivity in children.
Hair grows back thicker after shaving.
Humans evolved directly from monkeys.
You can catch a cold from being cold.
Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
